subject: Critical Thinking
title: Socrates: The Man Who Knew He Knew Nothing
description: A fast breakdown of Socrates: The Man Who Knew He Knew Nothing for builders.

hook.text: Socrates never wrote a word. He wandered Athens asking questions.

buildup.text: The Oracle at Delphi said no one was wiser than Socrates.

twist.text: Athens executed him for 'corrupting the youth.' His crime: teaching young people to question authority & think for.

climax.text: His legacy: the Socratic method is used in law schools, therapy, & education worldwide.
